ilsrep.poll.server.db
Class DBManager

java.lang.Object
  ilsrep.poll.server.db.DBManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
SQLiteDBManager
public abstract class DBManager
extends java.lang.Object

This abstract class is utility for working with any DB.
There should be concrete class, which works with concrete DB.

Author:
TKOST, DRC

readIntOptionFromConfiguration

public static int readIntOptionFromConfiguration(net.sf.xpilotpanel.preferences.Preferences conf,
                                                 java.lang.String option)
`Cos of XPilotPanel lib's functionality lack this is used to read "int" option and if option in configuration file is corrupted use default value from PreferencesModel.

Parameters:
conf - Configuration.
option - Option name.
Returns:
Option as int.

storePollsession

public int storePollsession(Pollsession sess)
Stores pollsession in DB.

Parameters:
sess - Pollsession, w/o id.
Returns:
Id of this pollsession in DB, or -1 if it weren't added.

removePollsession

public void removePollsession(java.lang.String id)
Removes pollsession from DB.

Parameters:
id - Id of pollsession to remove.

updatePollsession

public void updatePollsession(java.lang.String id,
                              Pollsession sess)
Updates existing pollsession in DB.
In fact removes old and inserts new.

Parameters:
id - Id of pollsession to update.
sess - New pollsession data.

           throws java.sql.SQLException
